character.age: 250 years old (but appears to be in mid-40s due to dwarven aging process)
character.background: Astrid was born and raised in the dwarven clanhold of Kragnir. She is a skilled craftsman and warrior, known for her exceptional leadership skills and unwavering dedication to her people.
character.place-of-birth: Kragnir Clanhold, Deep beneath the Iron Mountains

physical-appearance.hair-color: Bronze-colored braids adorned with intricate silver trinkets
